requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1030 TI
  • Storage: 170 MB available space
